    SupplyChain365 Modules Overview

    SupplyChain365 consists of modules that can be activated by enabling them under Admin > Licenses in the SupplyChain365 portal. Each module contains specific functionalities that are important for the relevant processes.

    Available Modules

    ğŸ“¦ Warehouse Module

    Transform your warehouse operation and eliminate paper processes. Optimize inbound, storage and outbound of goods using barcode scanning or RFID. Use integrated wireless mobile technology to collaborate in real-time between the back office and the logistics shop floor.

    • ğŸ“± Mobile Technology â€” Real-time collaboration between back office and warehouse floor

    • ğŸ·ï¸ Tracking & Labels â€” Register serial numbers, lot numbers, and print barcode labels
    • ğŸ“¦ Pallet Management â€” Process pallet deliveries using license plates as logistic units
    • ğŸ“¡ RFID Support â€” Advanced tracking with RFID technology

    ğŸšš Transport Module

    Digital transformation of the transport process, delivery and collection of goods. Easily convert orders to transport orders with comprehensive planning and tracking capabilities.

    ğŸ¤ Collaborate & Exchange Module

    Specialized module for companies that need to collaborate and exchange data with external partners in their supply chain ecosystem.

    ğŸ¢ 3PL & VAL Module

    This module is especially designed for transport and storage companies that perform logistics for third parties (3PL - Third Party Logistics).

    Key Features:

    • ğŸ‘¥ Multi-Client Management â€” Register inbound, storage, and outbound per client
    • ğŸ“Š Real-Time Stock Positions â€” Easily report stock positions per client
    • ğŸ“ Stock Tracking â€” Keep track of which stock has been where, for how long
    • ğŸš› Cross Docking â€” Efficient cross-docking to minimize waiting times for loading/unloading
    • ğŸ’° Rate Management â€” Set charging rates per client and per activity
    • ğŸ“ˆ Automatic Reporting â€” Automated custody fee reporting per 3PL customer
    • ğŸ”— Module Integration â€” Works seamlessly with Warehouse, Transport, and Collaborate & Exchange modules

    Benefits:

    • Complete 3PL process execution
    • Transparent billing per client
    • Efficient operations for multiple customers
    • Real-time visibility for all stakeholders

    Module Activation

    To activate modules in your SupplyChain365 environment:

    1. Navigate to Admin > Licenses in the SupplyChain365 portal
    2. Select the modules you need for your operations
    3. Enable the selected modules
    4. Configure module-specific settings as required

    Module Integration

    All SupplyChain365 modules are designed to work seamlessly together, providing a comprehensive supply chain execution platform:

    • Warehouse + Transport â€” Complete logistics operation from storage to delivery
    • 3PL & VAL + Warehouse + Transport â€” Full 3PL service capability
    • Collaborate & Exchange + All Modules â€” Extended ecosystem collaboration

    Choose the modules that best fit your supply chain execution needs and scale as your operations grow.

    Why we love Cookies

    We use cookies to try and give you a better experience in Supplychain365.

    You can learn more about what kind of cookies we use, why, and how from our Privacy policy. If you hate cookies, or are just on a diet, you can disable them altogether too. Just note that the Freshdesk service is pretty big on some cookies (we love the choco-chip ones), and some portions of Freshdesk may not work properly if you disable cookies.

    Weâ€™ll also assume you agree to the way we use cookies and are ok with it as described in our Privacy policy, unless you choose to disable them altogether through your browser.
